org.apache.fineract.batch.service

Class BatchApiServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.fineract.batch.service.BatchApiServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BatchApiService

    @Service
public class BatchApiServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements BatchApiService
    Implementation for BatchApiService to iterate through all the incoming requests and obtain the appropriate CommandStrategy from CommandStrategyProvider.
    Author:
    Rishabh Shukla
    See Also:
    BatchRequest, BatchResponse, CommandStrategyProvider

    • Method Detail

      • handleBatchRequestsWithoutEnclosingTransaction

        public java.util.List<BatchResponse> handleBatchRequestsWithoutEnclosingTransaction(java.util.List<BatchRequest> requestList,
                                                                                    javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo)
        Description copied from interface: BatchApiService
        Returns a list of BatchResponses by getting the appropriate CommandStrategy for every BatchRequest. It will be used when the Query Parameter "enclosingTransaction "is set to 'false'.
        Specified by:
        handleBatchRequestsWithoutEnclosingTransaction in interface BatchApiService
        Returns:
        List

      • handleBatchRequestsWithEnclosingTransaction

        public java.util.List<BatchResponse> handleBatchRequestsWithEnclosingTransaction(java.util.List<BatchRequest> requestList,
                                                                                 javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo)
        Description copied from interface: BatchApiService
        returns a list of BatchResponses by getting the appropriate CommandStrategy for every BatchRequest. It will be used when the Query Parameter "enclosingTransaction "is set to 'true'. If one or more of the requests are not completed properly then whole of the transaction will be rolled back properly.
        Specified by:
        handleBatchRequestsWithEnclosingTransaction in interface BatchApiService
        Returns:
        List
